author: mbenson
msg: Make ContainerMapper abstract; move chained/composite behaviors to

author: mbenson
msg: Incorporate <waitfor> to improve the chances of a pass on Windows.  :(
Also make the failures more instructive for redirect* testcases.

author: stevel
msg: Purge of many (but not all) the if-java-1.1 tests in the ant code. I left those in the tests in, and I left the javac and javadoc tests in, as they are more complex. This is the simple set.

author: stevel
msg: A new uptodate test that includes granularity. the
intent is to move all date tests to this single place, to eliminate inconsistencies.
The only place I use it is signjar, which, by virtue of the fact there is no signjar test, means I know it wont break the tests.
Also, cleaned up the reflection hacks for 1.1.

author: stevel
msg: One less complaint from jikes about code style.
